mdRecord.dcterms:title: The Floyd County Bank Hand Fan
mdRecord.dcterms:description: A hand fan produced by The Floyd County Bank of Floyd, Virginia. The fan says "A good fan for good people from a good bank in a good town." The back of the fan lists "A Dozen Points for Home Town Progress" - which tell of the advantages of keeping money within the local community.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Fans
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
